output.description: The generated answer or response to the input question.

dataset_name.description: The name of the dataset the sample belongs to. Null if not available.

subdataset_name.description: The name of the sub-dataset the sample belongs to. Null if not available.

language.description: The language code of the input and output (e.g., 'fin' for Finnish). Null if not available.

split.description: The data split the sample belongs to (e.g., 'test', 'train', 'validation'). Null if not available.

language_name.description: The full name of the language (e.g., 'Finnish'). Null if not available.
